Crimes.Legal_Issue: Assessment of state protection and Convention grounds
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review under s 72 of IRPA
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution due to blood feud in Albania
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Adequacy of state protection and efforts to access it
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to properly assess adequacy of state protection
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Specific applicant experiences regarding police non-involvement
Crimes.Legal_Standard: State protection must be reasonably available and accessible
Crimes.Application_Factor: Exhaustion of reasonable steps to obtain state protection
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA and jurisprudence on refugee protection
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Insufficient demonstration of state protection unavailability
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Weight given to general country conditions over individual circumstances
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Minor concerns outweighed by credible testimony
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Inadequate explanation of state protection analysis
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to consider specific evidence of lack of police intervention

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility and state protection assessment involving false documentation
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review under s 72 of IRPA
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Attestation letters deemed unreliable; personal testimony accepted
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution due to blood feud in Albania
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Credibility of supporting documents and adequacy of state protection
Crimes.Application_Error: Improper dismissal of reconciliation efforts and inadequate state protection analysis
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Contextual reasons for using attestation letters and local reconciliation attempts
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Credibility findings must be reasonable and based on record
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of potentially falsified documents to support claim
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA and jurisprudence on credibility and refugee protection
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Doubt about document authenticity and failure to exhaust state protection
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Overreliance on document authenticity without contextual consideration
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Concerns about insufficient reasoning on key issues
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Partial credibility assigned; documentary support questioned
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RPD's reasonableness in credibility assessment
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Inadequate explanation of credibility and protection conclusions
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to assess adequacy of informal reconciliation efforts
